1.0.name: wordpress/blockq
1.0.description:
Unclutter long <blockquote>'s into show/hidden sections. Click on 'more' and unhide it. Surround text inside <blockquote> with [blockq][/blockq] to make it work.

More info:

  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author.
  • Also at iPublicis4Wordpress.

f you find it useful, please consider to make a donation or offer a gift to BlockQ's author (anything will be appreciated).

Requirements

  • PHP 5.x (maybe works too in PHP4, but not tested and not supported by me).
  • WordPress 2.7.x or higher (maybe would work on older WP, but not tested and not supported by me).
  • Not tested and not supported on IIS servers.
